      • startGeofenceWithPermissionDialog

        @Deprecated
public void startGeofenceWithPermissionDialog(java.lang.String message)
        Deprecated. 
        startGeofenceWithPermissionDialog is deprecated. Instead 1. set SH_GEO_PERMISSION_BUTTON_TEXT, SH_GEO_PERMISSION_TITLE and SH_GEO_PERMISSION_MESSAGE in res/values/strings.xml of your app 2. Use startGeofenceWithPermissionDialog();
        Parameters:
        message -

      • startGeofenceWithPermissionDialog

        public void startGeofenceWithPermissionDialog()
        use startGeofenceWithPermissionDialog to make SDK ask for location permission from user.
